descriptionSet.description: The main illustration in this advertisement for "Afghan Snow" shows a woman from behind who holds a mirror in her left hand and looking at herself. She wears a silk skirt and leans back on two white pillows. Her black hair is tightly tied up and adorned with a rose. She wears pearl necklaces and earrings, and a ring on her left middle finger. Apparently, the illustration uses a range of stereotypical motifs of female beauty and the importance of body care.
There is a second illustration showing a pot of the cream, with its lid open. The opened pot is surrounded by different flowers.

inscription.text: An aid to Beauty that is the instinctive choice of every lovely woman for rose-petal softness of skin and a flawless complexion.
AFGHAN SNOW Leading Beauty Cream of the East
ESP Perfume ESP THE MARK OF EXCELLENCE (manufacturer's signet)
AFGHAN SNOW AN IDEAL DAY CREAM Cleanses and Nourishes PLACE LID TIGHTLY AFTER USE [text within illustration]

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: Afghan Snow body care product advertisement
